attributes.long-description:
Monkey Madness!

The madness begins with Spike's pursuit of Specter and over 300 zany monkeys intent on changing the world. The chimps are on the loose and must be stopped!

Utilizing the PlayStation®Portable System's Wi-Fi feature, challenge your friends to thrilling mini-games like snowboarding, boxing, racing and ping pong, anytime, anywhere. There's no time for hangin' around - these monkeys mean business!

Key Features
• Featuring Wi-Fi wireless LAN (Ad Hoc) connectivity, players can utilize mulitplayer mode and play through a variety of mini-games, such as snowboarding, boxing, racing and ping pong.
• Choose from more than eight gadgets and vehicles to help hunt down these mischeivous monkeys.
• Over 300 monkeys with unique personalities. Some are tough and competitive, others are just wise guys.

Ape Escape is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2005 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Note: May require Memory Stick Duo™

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PLAYSTATION®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Ape Escape® On the Loose
